hero.description: Browse through our diverse range of meticulously crafted garments, designed to bring out your individuality and cater to your sense of style.

browse.title: BROWSE BY DRESS STYLE
browse.subtitle: Discover the perfect outfit for every occasion
browse.casualDesc: Comfortable and relaxed outfits for everyday wear
browse.formalDesc: Elegant and professional attire for formal occasions
browse.partyDesc: Trendy and stylish outfits for parties and events
browse.gymDesc: Sporty and comfortable wear for workouts and gym
browse.footerText: Our clothing options are tailored for every style and occasion

footer.newsletterTitle: Stay up to date about our latest offers
footer.brandDesc: We have clothes that suit your style and which you're proud to wear. From women to men.
